title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 3 Fun Lots of Crypto Collectibles for auction:LOT 1: 2018 Monero conference badge. Lights up!! STARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 2: Time Bandits Satoshi Nakamoto figure set. Limited to 50 of each makeSTARTING BID: 0.0070BTCLOT 3: Bitcoin solar zen garden gnome. STARTING BID: 0.0005BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: MARCH 26th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: DECLINE TO BE LISTED
